analyzed: ānīyamānaḥ svādya tvam sthāyī bhāvaḥ rasaḥ smṛtaḥ
jñāyamāna tayā tatra vibhāvaḥ bhāva poṣa kṛt
ālambana uddīpana tva prabhedena sa ca dvidhā
anubhāvaḥ vikāraḥ tu bhāva saṃsūcana ātmakaḥ
hetu kārya ātmanoḥ siddhiḥ tayoḥ saṃvyavahārataḥ
sukha duḥkha ādikaiḥ bhāvaiḥ bhāvaḥ tad bhāva bhāvanam
pṛthak bhāvāḥ sāttvikāḥ
sattvāt eva samutpatteḥ tat ca tad bhāva bhāvanam
stambha pralaya romāñcāḥ svedaḥ vaivarṇya vepathū
aśru vaisvaryam iti aṣṭau stambhaḥ asmin niṣkriya aṅgatā
pralayaḥ naṣṭa sañjña tvam śeṣāḥ su vyakta lakṣaṇāḥ
viśeṣāt ābhimukhyena carantaḥ vyabhicāriṇaḥ
sthāyini unmagna nirmagnāḥ kallolāḥ iva vāridhau
nirveda glāni śaṅkā śrama dhṛti jaḍa tā harṣa dainya augrya cintāḥ
trāsa īrṣyā āmarṣa garvāḥ smṛti maraṇa madāḥ supta nidrā vibodhāḥ
vrīḍā apasmāra mohāḥ samatiḥ alasa tā vega tarka avahitthā
vyādhi unmādau vipāda utsuka capala yutāḥ triṃśat ete trayaḥ ca
tattva jñāna apadīrṣya ādeḥ nirvedaḥ sva avamānanam
tatra cintā aśru niḥśvāsa vaiavarṇya ucchvāsa dīna tāḥ
rati ādi āyāsa tṛṣ kṣudbhiḥ glāniḥ niṣprāṇa tā iha ca
vaivarṇya kampa anutsāha kṣāma aṅga vacana kriyāḥ
anartha pratibhā śaṅkā para krauryāt sva durnayāt
kampa śoṣa abhivīkṣā ādiḥ atra varṇa svara anya tā
śramaḥ kheda udhvara ti ādeḥ svedaḥ usmin mardana ādayaḥ
santoṣaḥ jñāna śakti ādeḥ dhṛtiḥ avyagra bhoga kṛt
apratipattiḥ jaḍa tā syāt iṣṭa aniṣṭa darśana śrutibhiḥ
animiṣa nayana nirīkṣaṇa tūṣṇīmbhāva ādayaḥ tatra
prasattiḥ utsava ādibhyaḥ harṣa uśru sveda gadgadāḥ
daurgatya ādyaiḥ anaujasyam dainyam kārṣṇya ābhṛja ādimat
duṣṭa iparādha daurmukhya krauryaiḥ caṇḍa tvam ugra tā
tatra sveda śiraḥ kampa tarjana ātāḍana ādayaḥ
dhyānam cintā īhita anāpteḥ śūnyatā śvāsa tāpa kṛt
garjita ādeḥ manaḥ kṣobhaḥ trāsa utra utkampita ādayaḥ
para utkarṣa akṣamā asūyā garva daurjanya manyu jā
doṣa ukti avajñe sru kuṭi manyu krodha iṅgitāni ca
adhikṣepa apamāna ādeḥ amarṣaḥ abhiniviṣṭa tā
tatra kheda śiraḥ kampa tarjana ātāḍana ādayaḥ
garvobhiḥ jana lāvaṇya bala aiśvarya ādibhiḥ madaḥ
karmāṇi ādharpaṇa avajñā savilāsa aṅga vīkṣaṇam
sadṛśa jñāna cintā ādyaiḥ saṃskārāt smṛtiḥ atra ca
jñāta tvena artha bhāsinyām bhrū samunnayana ādayaḥ
maraṇam su prasiddha tvāt anartha tvāt ca nā ucyate
nidrā hāsaḥ utra ruditam jyeṣṭha madhya adhama ādiṣu

original: suptaṃ nidrodbhavaṃ tatra śvāsocchāsakriyā param // DhDaś_4.20 //

āveśaḥ graha duḥkha ādyaiḥ apasmāraḥ yathā vidhiḥ
bhūpāta kampa prakheda lālā phena udgama ādayaḥ
